tasks.dev-firefox: deno --allow-write manifest/build-manifest.mjs firefox && deno task bundle
tasks.dev-chrome: deno --allow-write manifest/build-manifest.mjs chrome && deno task bundle
tasks.dev-edge: deno --allow-write manifest/build-manifest.mjs edge && deno task bundle
tasks.dev-safari: deno --allow-write manifest/build-manifest.mjs safari && deno task bundle
tasks.build-firefox: deno task dev-firefox && bash bin/build-extension.bash firefox
tasks.build-chrome: deno task dev-chrome && bash bin/build-extension.bash chrome
tasks.build-edge: deno task dev-edge && bash bin/build-extension.bash edge
tasks.build-safari: deno task dev-safari && bash bin/build-extension.bash safari
